attributes.action: legalise prostittion. this will allow for the collection of income tax, from prostitutes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should prostitutes not have to pay income tax, prostitution should be legalised, allowing the government not only to collect income tax from prostitutes, but also to clean up the streets, and help protect prostitutes against violence etc.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
